name: Treepair
description:
The earth is being over run by plague and scorched from above! The only way to stop it is to plant trees. Plant a tree on fertile land and watch it spread to neighbouring fertile lands. The plague will earn you money to spend on trees, fertiliser, and scorching, but watchout for the plague taking over too quickly! Beat the level by reaching the greenery threshold.

This game was made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2020. The theme of the jam was repair.
